title: Equivalent of Type::toScalarType for Python-side dtype
body_html:
I have a dtype, I want the byte-ified version of it (if it was a CPU float dtype, I want CPU byte dtype; if it was GPU float dtype, I want GPU byte dtype). In ATen I can use toScalarType. The new Python-side dtype doesn't have this.

A generalized version of this ticket is to ensure API parity between ATen Type, and PyTorch dtype. (Maybe we should rename ATen type so that the names line up too.)
